Content: Major General D.K.G.D Sirisena, Colonel Commandant, Sri Lanka Corps of Military Police (SLCMP) recently paid a formal visit to the 4 SLCMP HQ in Jaffna. During the visit, the Senior Officer was accorded a Guard Turnout and he planted a sapling in the camp premises to make his visit memorable. He also addressed all the officers and Other Ranks before he joined an all rank tea. Brigadier A.L Illangakoon, SLCMP Centre Commandant was also present at the occasion.
